koti thrasthawadayata pakshapathi wuwa sema eeta sahaya dun boho ratawal ha indiyawada bedumwadayata pakshawa kriyakala danudu kriyakarana merata deshapalakayan ha rajya nowana sanwidhana da thrasthawadaya mardanaya kara rata raka ganimata badha pamunuwaddi ee siyallanta muhuna di thrasthawadaya nima karalimata ethumanta sahaya wu bhikshun wahanse athara oomare kassapa himiyan pramukha pele keneki. 2005 janadhipathiwaranaya ha 2010 janadhipathiwaranaya jayagrahanaya kirimata menma uthura ha nagenahira satanwadunu ranawiruwan ha asarana gamwasiyan dirimath kirimatada unwahanse nobiyawa idiripathwa kriyakalaha.
